content: I can only offer the same idea I have for several years now: the RedBlu Duopoly must be destroyed as the necessary condition for the continuation of a free and open republic. This means that either the Republican Party or the Democratic Party must, for at least one full election cycle, cease to be the national party it is now, replaced by two or more component parts. Only that will compel the realignment which the Beltway status quo has stifled since the fall of the Warsaw Pact. The duopoly compels a false choice between warmongering neocons for POTUS. So long as that is true, no meaningful political change is possible in the United States.
